game.name: where's my egg?
game.categories: 싱글 플레이어, Steam 도전 과제, 음량 개별 조정, 키보드 전용 옵션, 퀵타임 이벤트 없이 플레이 가능, 수시 저장, Steam Cloud, 가족 공유
game.shortDescription: Where’s my egg? A poor chicken dad has sadly lost his eggs. Help him find 62 strange eggs and bring them back.
game.shortDescriptionEn: Where’s my egg? A poor chicken dad has sadly lost his eggs. Help him find 62 strange eggs and bring them back.
